title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
2 point(s) maximum

Support (1 point)

• Strigolactones promote germination (of the obligate parasitic weed)

Reasoning (1 point)

• Seeds only germinate when host plant/food source is present

• Seeds do not germinate when host plant/food source is not present
